# EnemyWeaponFactory

## Schema

```js
EnemyWeaponFactory = {
  id,
  idCN,
  name,
  mod,
  animeLoop,
  animeName,
  attackPer,
  attackTime,
  attackTotal,
  audio,
  bulletCount,
  bulletCountEvery,
  bulletEvery,
  bulletInterval,
  bulletMax,
  bulletid,
  cd,
  clipMax,
  damage,
  fireShootDir,
  fxDistance,
  fxHasCollider,
  genAngle,
  genBulletCount,
  genDistance,
  genLastAngle,
  genLastOffsets,
  hasCollider,
  initCnt,
  isAtkStopMove,
  isDie,
  isFollow,
  keepPer,
  lineLength,
  modeUrl,
  newlineAngle,
  newlineOffset,
  reloadingTime,
  rotAngle,
  rotSpeed,
  shootAngle,
  shootDeltaTime,
  shootDistance,
  shootType,
  unitid,
}
```
